climatePledgeFriendly.details: EPEAT products are assessed against criteria including energy use and have a reduced sustainability impact across their lifecycle. SILVER TCO Certified identifies IT products that are independently assessed for lower environmental and social impact, safer chemicals, and circular design.

features: SCREEN PERFORMANCE: The 1600 x 900 HD plus resolution is perfect for everyday work. ComfortView, a feature that lowers harmful blue light emissions, ensures eye comfort over long periods of time
ENHANCE YOUR WORKSPACE: A thinner profile than the previous generation - improved cable management creates a smaller footprint, lending itself to a clean, uncluttered desk
ENERGY EFFICIENT: This monitor meets the latest regulatory and environmental standards. ENERGY STAR and TCO Certified and is registered EPEAT Gold. Awarded the ENERGY STAR Most Efficient Mark
ECO-CONSCIOUS PACKAGING: This monitor’s packaging is Styrofoam-free. Packed with at least 75% recycled cardboard material to minimize our environmental production impact
PRODUCTIVE AT EVERY LEVEL: Dell Display Manager’s Easy Arrange feature lets you quickly tile and view your applications side by side across one or more connected screens for multitasking efficiency
body.description: Maximize your workspace: A thin profile and improved cable management create a smaller footprint, lending itself to a clean, uncluttered desk. Compared to the previous generation. Enhanced views: The 1600x900 resolution is ideal for everyday tasks, while ComfortView is ready for extended viewing periods. It reduces up to 60% of harmful blue light emissions. Versatile connections: Our E Series monitors accommodate legacy and non-legacy systems with convenient connectivity options like VGA and DP ports. Your workspace will be completely customized to your needs. Adapts to your needs: Make your workspace your own with VESA-compatible mounts and stands.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All the essentials, and then some Maximize your workspace: A thin profile and improved cable management create a smaller footprint, lending itself to a clean, uncluttered desk. Compared to the previous generation. Enhanced views: The 1600x900 resolution is ideal for everyday tasks, while ComfortView is ready for extended viewing periods. It reduces up to 60% of harmful blue light emissions. Versatile connections: Our E Series monitors accommodate legacy and non-legacy systems with convenient connectivity options like VGA and DP ports. Your workspace will be completely customized to your needs. Adapts to your needs: Make your workspace your own with VESA-compatible mounts and stands.

Improved Dell Display Manager Productive at every level: Dell Display Manager’s (DDM) Easy Arrange feature lets you quickly tile and view your applications side by side across one or more connected screens for multitasking efficiency. And with the improved DDM, you’ll get even more preset layouts. Seamless transitions: The auto-restore feature remembers where you left off, so applications will go back to where you left them, even after you’ve unplugged.

Energy reducing Save energy with PowerNap, a feature that dims or puts the monitor to sleep when not in use. Guaranteed green: Compliant with the latest Energy Star standards, the E Series monitors meet stringent energy efficiency requirements while in sleep, on and off modes. They’re also EPEAT registered and TCO Certified. Clean disposal: Composting or recycling the packaging is easy since it’s made with at least 25% of recycled cardboard.
Ports and Slots 1. Power Port | 2. DP Port 1.2 | 3. VGA Port

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Busn Office Use - Multiple screens
reviews.reviewText: Our office use Laptops with 2 additional screens for each desk. Everything I have is Dell. I didn't want to use the largest Dell monitors, at this specific workstation, so these E2020's work perfectly. Arrived quickly, package in original Dell packing. I will be ordering more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Smaller" desktop screens are hard to find.
reviews.reviewText: My firm had given me a huge screen when I transitioned from laptop to desktop. I got a crick in my neck looking up, and everything was too large for comfortable document creation. This screen is the perfect size for working with Word documents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I was hoping it was larger. The monitor is being used for work. My other monitor screen went out.
reviews.reviewText: I dislike the size but today was the first day I used it along with my larger monitor. I bought it because of the Dell name. I am pleased with the color and picture quality. I didn't get let down by anything but my mistake of screen size and not realizing it wasn't set up with the HDMI outlet. I rearranged the monitors and have it setting on a riser now. I am satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No surprises, just what I ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for office use
reviews.reviewText: We've purchased many of these for our office use and have been satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You will take the pink line and like it!
reviews.reviewText: A pink line suddenly appears. The support tells you run a test. Test showed there's just a pink line now, so enjoy! Dell says, oh well, replace monitor. For free? Oh gosh no. Even though you just purchased this monitor, but another one from us or just enjoy our bonus free pink line!Dell products are always a mistake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ease of assembly
reviews.reviewText: Liked that it was exactly as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dell Quality Monitor
reviews.reviewText: This 20 inch Dell monitor appears to be another Dell quality product. It fits my desk and meets my needs just fine. Boots up quickly and has great color and graphics. Would recommend this product to others.
